metadata.synopsis: The spirit inside the Sentient Amulet, once a monk of Lathander, sees the true Blood of Lathander displayed before us. This was a holy relic for which many devout followers made their pilgrimage to the monastery that eventually became the Gith Creche.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CRE_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MonkAmulet_Get" and equip the amulet.- Approach the Blood of Lathander in the Creche: S_CRE_MonkAmulet_BloodOfLathanderBanter_4e40660b-9ea9-4716-9379-a521f333a920"goto 1077 3 -782"

0.speaker: GROUP_GLO_MonkAmulet_Spirit
0.text: The Blood of Lathander, as I barely live and hardly breathe. HahaHAhaha.
